Package com.firetrack.controller

Class AlertController

java.lang.Object
com.firetrack.controller.AlertController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/alerts") public class AlertController extends Object
Controller class for managing alerts in the Firetrack system.

  • Method Details

    • getAllAlerts

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Alert>> getAllAlerts()
      Retrieves all alerts.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a list of Alert objects.

    • createAlert

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Alert> createAlert(@RequestBody Alert alert)
      Creates a new alert.
      Parameters:
      alert - The Alert object to be created.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the newly created Alert object.

    • updateAlertStatus

      @PutMapping("/{alertId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Alert> updateAlertStatus(@PathVariable Long alertId, @RequestBody Alert alert)
      Updates the status of a specific alert.
      Parameters:
      alertId - The ID of the alert to be updated.
      alert - The updated Alert object.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the updated Alert object.

    • getAlertsByTrackingPoint

      @GetMapping("/trackingPoint/{pointId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Alert>> getAlertsByTrackingPoint(@PathVariable Long pointId)
      Retrieves alerts associated with a specific tracking point.
      Parameters:
      pointId - The ID of the tracking point.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a list of Alert objects.

    • checkActiveAlerts

      @GetMapping("/active") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> checkActiveAlerts()
      Checks if there are any active alerts.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a Boolean indicating whether there are active alerts.
